## Installation

You can install from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("maellebeaudinet/mbpackage")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(mbpackage)
## basic example code
```


```{r cars}

```
